## StoryPointsControlsProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [StoryPointsControls](./controls.storypointscontrols.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StoryPointsControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cycle?](./controls.storypointscontrolsprops.cycle.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to cycle to the first/last POI after reaching the end/start. When false, controls with emit 'ExitStoryPoints' events. Defaults to false. |
|  [useKeyboard?](./controls.storypointscontrolsprops.usekeyboard.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Use keyboard arrow keys as navigation, defaults to true |
